design_philosophy.vibe: Swiss Style Fintech - Clean, Grid-based, Data-forward

usage_rules.headings: Use Manrope for all page titles and section headers. Weight: SemiBold (600) or Bold (700).
usage_rules.body: Use IBM Plex Sans for all standard text, labels, and descriptions.
usage_rules.data: Use JetBrains Mono for ALL numerical data, currency values, and DSA visualization elements (e.g., 'Heap Top: $500').

primary.description: Deep Royal Blue - Trust, Academic Authority

dashboard_structure.wrapper: grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-4 gap-6 p-6 max-w-7xl mx-auto

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 rounded-md px-4 py-2 font-medium shadow-sm
buttons.secondary: bg-white border border-slate-200 text-slate-700 hover:bg-slate-50 rounded-md px-4 py-2 font-medium
buttons.destructive: bg-destructive text-destructive-foreground hover:bg-destructive/90 rounded-md px-4 py-2

inputs.style: border-slate-200 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-primary/20 focus:border-primary rounded-md bg-white

dsa_visualizers.heap_view: Represent the Max Heap as a visual tree or a sorted list card. Use 'JetBrains Mono' for values.

visual_assets.icons: Use Lucide React icons (default). Stroke width: 1.5px for a clean look.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text-slate-500 is only used on white backgrounds. Use text-slate-600 for better legibility if needed.
accessibility.focus_states: Visible focus rings on all interactive elements.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. IMPLEMENTATION: Use Shadcn UI components but override the default radius to '0.5rem' (rounded-lg) and '0.375rem' (rounded-md) for a professional feel.

2. DSA VISUALIZATION: This is an academic project. When displaying 'Top Expenses' (Heap) or 'Recent Transactions' (Stack), explicitly label them as such in the UI (e.g., section title: 'Top Expenses (Max Heap)').
3. ALERTS: Use the 'destructive' color for budget alerts (80%, 100%). Create a prominent 'AlertBox' component for these notifications.
4. DATA FORMATTING: Always format currency with '$' and 2 decimal places using JetBrains Mono font.
5. EMPTY STATES: Use simple text or a subtle icon for empty states (e.g., 'No transactions in Stack').
6. NAVIGATION: Create a clean sidebar or top navigation bar. Active state should be 'bg-primary/10 text-primary'.
7. TESTING: Add 'data-testid' to all buttons, inputs, and key display areas.
universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for backgrounds. Use solid colors or subtle patterns.
Ensure all containers with borders have internal padding (p-4 or p-6).
